OrgName.entry: ETHNIC MINORITY AND TRAVELLER ACHIEVEMENT SERVICE (EMTAS)

Desc.entry: Part of Inclusion and Learning Services which is part of Children and Young People's Services. Aims to raise standards of achievement for black and minority ethnic (BME) and travellers groups who are underachieving or at risk of underachieving. Aims to meet the particular needs of children and young people for whom English is an Additional Language (EAL). Provides support to meet the educational needs of new arrivals, refugees, asylum seekers and traveller children and young people. Seeks to increase community cohesion between different cultural, religious and ethnic groups. Enables and empowers partners and stakeholders to focus mainstream resources on achieving equality in participation and outcomes.

Langs.entry: Arabic, Cantonese, Mandarin, Punjabi, Somali, Urdu
